程序包 android.car.drivingstate

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    CarDrivingStateManager.CarDrivingStateEventListener
    Listener Interface for clients to implement to get updated on driving state changes.
    CarUxRestrictionsManager.OnUxRestrictionsChangedListener
    Listener Interface for clients to implement to get updated on driving state related changes.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    CarDrivingStateEvent
    Driving State related events.
    CarDrivingStateManager
    API to register and get driving state related information in a car.
    CarUxRestrictions
    Car UX Restrictions event.
    CarUxRestrictions.Builder
    Builder class for CarUxRestrictions
    CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration
    Configuration for Car UX Restrictions service.
    CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration.Builder  
    CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration.Builder.SpeedRange
    Speed range is defined by min and max speed.
    CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration.DrivingStateRestrictions
    UX restrictions to be applied to a driving state through CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration.Builder.setUxRestrictions(int, CarUxRestrictionsConfiguration.DrivingStateRestrictions).
    CarUxRestrictionsManager
    API to register and get the User Experience restrictions imposed based on the car's driving state.
  • 注释类型概要 
    注释类型 说明
    CarDrivingStateEvent.CarDrivingState  
    CarUxRestrictions.CarUxRestrictionsInfo
